name: Yarnman
description:
The fate of Yarnman rests in your hands in this new endless runner game!

Run as fast as you can through the dim forest to save the life of Yarnman who was lost and fights to find his way back home. Be careful, dodge thorns, jump out rocks, evade pits – show us your skills! Use power-up to run even furtgher and avoid dangers in the woods.

  • Unique setting in a gloomy hostile forest with plenty of dangers!
  • Unique main character made of yarn that jumps as an acrobat!
  • Collect buttons to power-up!
  • Top-up and achievements!
  • Throw challenge to your friends and run further that anyone ever managed!

Game Yarnman is free to play, without any purchases to unlock the features, just pure fun and challenge!
